title: The Board Room Game Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Canadian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe-style place where one plays board and card games. Offers snack food and drinks including a vegetarian sandwich with cheese (can modify for vegans), naan bread, hummus, guacamole, popcorn, pretzels, smoothies, cane sugar sodas,iced tea, lemonade, soy milk for coffee and tea.
